content: 2010 Singaporean film ***Love Cuts*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 割爱) is a 2010 Singaporean [drama](/wiki/Drama_(film_and_television)) film directed by Gerald Lee. Commissioned by the [Health Promotion Board](/wiki/Health_Promotion_Board) of Singapore to encourage women of a certain age to get screened regularly for [breast cancer](/wiki/Breast_cancer), the film is among the first [message films](/wiki/Message_film) to be released in mainstream cinemas in Singapore. It revolves around two women who have been diagnosed with breast cancer, and how their loved ones respond with support and understanding while coping with their own fears of losing them. It stars [Zoe Tay](/wiki/Zoe_Tay) and [Kenny Ho](/wiki/Kenny_Ho). ## Cast ### Main and supporting - [Zoe Tay](/wiki/Zoe_Tay) as Sissy Chang - [Kenny Ho](/wiki/Kenny_Ho) as Chan Wai Mun - Regene Lim as Mabel Chan - [Edwin Goh](/wiki/Edwin_Goh) as Howard Chan - Christy Yow as Kristie Kong - [Zhu Xiufeng](/wiki/Zhu_Xiufeng) as Sissy's mother - Lin Ruping as Lady boss - Chen Zhiguang as Chinese restaurant boss - Choo Hoh Kin as Chemotherapy doctor - Wen Guoxian as [Love 97.2FM](/wiki/Love_97.2FM) DJ - Renee Ye as [Love 97.2FM](/wiki/Love_97.2FM) DJ ### Special appearances - [Allan Wu](/wiki/Allan_Wu) as Timothy Tang - [Desmond Tan](/wiki/Desmond_Tan_(actor)) as Young customer - Andy Lee as Stylist - Jalyn Han as Food delivery lady - [Huang Shinan](/wiki/Huang_Shinan) as Disgruntled customer - [Zhu Houren](/wiki/Zhu_Houren) as Sissy's doctor ## Awards and nominations YearAwardsCategoryRecipient(s) and nominee(s)ResultRef.2011Singapore e-AwardsBest Local Film—N/aNominatedBest Local DirectorGerald LeeNominated - *Love Cuts* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - *Love Cuts* on [Facebook](/wiki/Facebook_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub.
